member.name: T:PacMAPSharp.DistanceMetric
member.summary: Distance metrics supported by Enhanced PacMAP

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.DistanceMetric.Euclidean
member.summary: Euclidean distance (L2 norm) - most common choice for general data

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.DistanceMetric.Cosine
member.summary: Cosine distance - excellent for high-dimensional sparse data (text, images)

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.DistanceMetric.Manhattan
member.summary: Manhattan distance (L1 norm) - robust to outliers

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.DistanceMetric.Correlation
member.summary: Correlation distance - measures linear relationships, good for time series

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.DistanceMetric.Hamming
member.summary: Hamming distance - for binary or categorical data

member.name: T:PacMAPSharp.NormalizationMode
member.summary: Normalization modes for input data preprocessing

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.NormalizationMode.None
member.summary: No normalization applied - use raw data values

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.NormalizationMode.ZScore
member.summary: Z-score normalization: (x - μ) / σ - assumes normal distribution

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.NormalizationMode.MinMax
member.summary: Min-max scaling: (x - min) / (max - min) - maps to [0, 1] range

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.NormalizationMode.Robust
member.summary: Robust scaling: (x - median) / IQR - less sensitive to outliers

member.name: T:PacMAPSharp.HnswUseCase
member.summary: HNSW optimization use cases for different performance priorities

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.HnswUseCase.FastConstruction
member.summary: Minimize index construction time - fastest setup, lower accuracy

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.HnswUseCase.HighAccuracy
member.summary: Maximize search accuracy/recall - highest quality, slower setup

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.HnswUseCase.MemoryOptimized
member.summary: Minimize memory footprint - lowest memory usage

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.HnswUseCase.Balanced
member.summary: Balanced performance across all metrics - recommended default

member.name: T:PacMAPSharp.OutlierLevel
member.summary: Outlier severity levels for Enhanced PacMAP quality analysis

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.OutlierLevel.Normal
member.summary: Normal embedding - within expected quality range

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.OutlierLevel.Unusual
member.summary: Unusual embedding - slightly outside normal range but acceptable

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.OutlierLevel.Mild
member.summary: Mild outlier - embedding may be less accurate

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.OutlierLevel.Extreme
member.summary: Extreme outlier - embedding reliability is questionable

member.name: F:PacMAPSharp.OutlierLevel.NoMansLand
member.summary: Critical outlier - embedding is highly unreliable

member.name: T:PacMAPSharp.EmbeddingResult
member.summary: Comprehensive result from PacMAP embedding transformation Provides embedding coordinates plus quality assessment and diagnostics

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.EmbeddingResult.EmbeddingCoordinates
member.summary: Gets the embedding coordinates in the reduced dimensional space

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.EmbeddingResult.ConfidenceScore
member.summary: Gets the confidence score for the embedding quality (0.0 to 1.0) Higher values indicate better preservation of local/global structure

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.EmbeddingResult.Severity
member.summary: Gets the outlier severity assessment for this embedding

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.EmbeddingResult.DistanceStats
member.summary: Gets statistics about the embedding distances

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.EmbeddingResult.EmbeddingDimension
member.summary: Gets the dimensionality of the embedding coordinates

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.EmbeddingResult.IsReliable
member.summary: Gets whether the embedding is considered reliable for production use

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.EmbeddingResult.QualityAssessment
member.summary: Gets a human-readable interpretation of the result quality

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.EmbeddingResult.ToString
member.summary: Returns a comprehensive string representation of the embedding result

member.name: T:PacMAPSharp.ProgressCallback
member.summary: Enhanced progress callback delegate for training progress reporting
member.param: Additional information like timing, warnings, or quality metrics

member.name: T:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModelInfo
member.summary: Model information for a fitted PacMAP model

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModelInfo.TrainingSamples
member.summary: Gets the number of training samples used to fit this model

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModelInfo.InputDimension
member.summary: Gets the dimensionality of the input data

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModelInfo.OutputDimension
member.summary: Gets the dimensionality of the output embedding

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModelInfo.Neighbors
member.summary: Gets the number of nearest neighbors used

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModelInfo.Metric
member.summary: Gets the distance metric used for neighbor computation

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModelInfo.Normalization
member.summary: Gets the normalization mode applied to the input data

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModelInfo.UsedHNSW
member.summary: Gets whether HNSW acceleration was used

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModelInfo.HnswRecall
member.summary: Gets the HNSW recall percentage achieved (if HNSW was used)

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModelInfo.ToString
member.summary: Returns a comprehensive string representation of the model info

member.name: T:PacMAPSharp.PacmapHnswConfig
member.summary: HNSW configuration for PacMAP FFI

member.name: T:PacMAPSharp.PacmapConfig
member.summary: PacMAP configuration struct for FFI

member.name: T:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel
member.summary: Enhanced cross-platform C# wrapper for PacMAP dimensionality reduction Features: - HNSW acceleration for large datasets with density-adaptive local scaling - Multiple distance metrics and normalization modes - Complete model save/load functionality - Progress reporting with detailed callback support - Comprehensive quality assessment and validation - Graph symmetrization for improved connectivity

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.IsFitted
member.summary: Gets whether this model has been fitted to training data

member.name: P:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.ModelInfo
member.summary: Gets comprehensive information about the fitted model Only available after fitting

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new PacMAP model

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.GetVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the native PacMAP library
member.returns: Version string from the native library
member.exception: Thrown when native library cannot be loaded

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.VerifyLibrary
member.summary: Verifies that the native library can be loaded and returns version info
member.returns: True if library loads successfully, false otherwise

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a previously saved PacMAP model from file
member.param: Path to the saved model file
member.returns: Loaded PacMAP model ready for transformation
member.exception: Thrown when model file doesn't exist
Thrown when model file is corrupted

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.Fit(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Int32,System.Int32,PacMAPSharp.NormalizationMode,PacMAPSharp.DistanceMetric,PacMAPSharp.HnswUseCase,System.Boolean,System.UInt64,PacMAPSharp.ProgressCallback)
member.summary: Fits the PacMAP model to training data and returns the embedding
member.param: Training data as row-major array (samples × features)
Force exact KNN instead of HNSW (default: false)
member.returns: Embedding result with coordinates and quality assessment

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.Save(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the fitted model to a file for later use
member.param: Path where to save the model
member.exception: Thrown when model is not fitted

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the PacMAP model

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases unmanaged resources and optionally releases managed resources
member.param: True to release both managed and unmanaged resources

member.name: M:PacMAPSharp.PacMAPModel.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizer to ensure native resources are released
